channel.title: Kubeadm on 小楼一夜听春雨
channel.description: Recent content in Kubeadm on 小楼一夜听春雨

item.title: 更新kubeadm clusters 从v1.7.3至v1.8.3
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: Upgrading kubeadm clusters from 1.7 to 1.8 https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/administer-cluster/kubeadm-upgrade-1-8/ env 1 2 3 192.168.31.120 km, master 192.168.31.119 kn1 192.168.31.118 kn2 下载 kubeadm https://dl.k8s.io/release/v1.8.2/bin/linux/amd64/kubeadm 1 2 3 4 root@km:~# sudo chmod a+rx /usr/bin/kubeadm root@km:~# kubeadm version kubeadm version: &version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"8", GitVersion:"v1.8.2", GitCommit:"bdaeafa71f6c7c04636251031f93464384d54963", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-10-24T19:38:10Z", GoVersion:"go1.8.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"} root@km:~# 上传 1 2 root@km:~# kubeadm config upload from-file --config ./admin.conf unable to decode config from "./admin.conf" [no kind "Config" is registered for

item.title: ubuntu中安装kubeadm v1.8.4
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: Environment kubeadm: v1.8.4 所有节点都要安装 kubeadm, kubelet, kubectl 安装时，全使用 root 用户。直到 kubeadm join 成功后，全使用 非root用户 1 2 3 192.168.31.120 km master 192.168.31.119 kn1 node 192.168.31.118 kn2 node 加代理 准备FQ网络 命令行 加代理
